basics.name: Nazar Yavnyy
basics.label: Javascript software engineer
basics.summary: I am a Javascript Developer that focuses on front end tools such as React and Typescript. I have a high bar for the quality of code and quality of user experience. My area of expertise is React ecosystem, but I also have experience in backend software development.

work.name: Agena Tech
work.summary: Agena Tech is a Swedish company with many projects and products from e-commerce to healthcare. I designed architecture and led a small team on a multi-collaborative WCAG-compliant healthcare project. In parallel, I worked in a dynamic, fast-paced team on multiple startup/e-commerce products.

work.name: Pragma-IT
work.summary: Pragma-IT is a US-based healthcare company that provides software for therapists on the go. I led a small frontend team in multiple projects. Architected and developed low-code environment to easily create and maintain complex clinical note forms.

work.name: Freelance
work.summary: As a freelancer, I worked on multiple small and mid-size projects. I learned how to work and survive in an environment of remote and distributed teams.
highlights: Architected and developed multiple React Native apps that got tens of thousands of users

work.name: REMIT
work.summary: REMIT is a Ukrainian outsourcing company with exposure to the Swedish tech industry. I created many web apps from scratch, gained experience of working in a huge enterprise project with multiple teams and products.

work.name: RomexSoft
work.summary: RomexSoft is an outsourcing company that develops quality software. My primary role was to develop new features for the existing projects. I focused on developing soft skills and learning how to work as a tech team with tight deadlines. Learned how to use Git, JIRA for a benefit of the team. Owned multiple features on a high-quality healthcare system.

education.institution: London Institute of Leadership and Management
Ivan Franko National University of Lviv
